data: The stout old Glamorgan Castle, with studding-sails on either side, was running before the trade-wind on her course to India.
The stout old _Glamorgan Castle_, with studding-sails on either side, was running before the trade-wind on her course to India.
Kingston, William Henry Giles, 1814-1880; Gruine, W. G. C. [Illustrator]
